headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Is Betting Big on Homebuilders — Here’s Why
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway is investing heavily in homebuilders. Find out what’s driving the move—and what it could mean for the housing market.

raw.headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Is Betting Big on Homebuilders — Here’s Why
raw.summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway is investing heavily in homebuilders. Find out what’s driving the move—and what it could mean for the housing market.

headline: Home Is Where The Pain Is
summary: It's been a painful year for homebuilders. The iShares Home Construction ETF (ITB) remains stuck in a steep short-term downtrend, below its 200-DMA and much closer to 52-week lows than highs

raw.headline: Home Is Where The Pain Is

headline: LP Building Solutions Honors Veterans Through Partnerships With Gary Sinise Foundation, Wreaths Across America and More
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., November 10, 2025--LP Building Solutions (LP), a leading manufacturer of high-performance building products, is honoring and supporting veterans through partnerships and product donations to several national and local initiatives. These include the Gary Sinise Foundation, Manufacturing Institute’s Heroes MAKE America program, Veteran Village, Wreaths Across America and others—advancing LP’s purpose of Building a Better World™.

headline: 3 Value Stocks with Open Questions
summary: Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.

raw.headline: 3 Value Stocks with Open Questions
